Detailed Description

This header defines the GTI APIs to retrieve the current status of the target device.

Copyright (c) 1998-2016, Texas Instruments Inc., All rights reserved.

Define Documentation

#define GTI_CPU_MODE_AARCH32   1
#define GTI_CPU_MODE_AARCH64   2
#define GTI_TRG_BIG_ENDIAN   0x00000001

Indices of which target property to return for GTI_GET_TARGET_PROPERTIES().

Request endianness of target device.

Request board revision of target.

Request current cpu mode - ARMv8 only.

Request driver revision.

Request device (silicon) revision of target.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum GTI_STAT_TYPE

Status values that can be returned from GTI_STAT_EX2().

Enumerator:
GTI_STAT_UNKNOWN 

Execution status values.

Target device execution status could not be determined.

GTI_STAT_RUN 

Target device is running in debug mode.

GTI_STAT_LOW_POWER_RUN 

Target device is running in low power mode.

GTI_STAT_FREE_RUN 

Target device is running free (not under debug control).

GTI_STAT_HALTED_USER 

Target device halted because of user request.

GTI_STAT_HALTED_SWBP 

Target device halted because of software breakpoint.

GTI_STAT_HALTED_HWBP 

Target device halted because of hardware breakpoint.

GTI_STAT_HALTED_OTHER 

Target device halted for undetermined reason.

GTI_STAT_HALTED_GBLBP 

Target device halted because of global breakpoint.

GTI_STAT_HALTED_ASYS 

Halted by analysis break.

GTI_STAT_HALTED_SEMI_HOSTING 

Halted by semi-hosting breakpoint.

GTI_STAT_POWERED 

Power status values.

Target device has power.

GTI_STAT_UNPOWERED 

Target device is powered down.

GTI_STAT_POWERED_DBG_OVERRIDE 

Target device has power (forced by debug).

GTI_STAT_RESET_ASSERTED 

Reset status values.

Reset is currently asserted on target device.

GTI_STAT_RESET_SINCE_LAST_STAT 

Target device was reset since last status call.

GTI_STAT_RESET_NONE 

Reset is not asserted on target device.

GTI_STAT_RESET_BLOCK_ENABLE 

Reset block mode is enabled.

GTI_STAT_SECURE_MODE 

Secure status values.

Target device is in secure mode.

GTI_STAT_NON_SECURE_MODE 

Target device is in non-secure mode.

GTI_STAT_CONNECTED 

Connection status values.

Target device is connected.

GTI_STAT_DISCONNECTED 

Target device is disconnected.

GTI_STAT_ERR_ILLEGAL_OP 

Error status values.

Illegal operation was attempted.

GTI_STAT_ERR_COMM 

Debug probe lost communications with target board.

GTI_STAT_ERR_NO_JTAG_CLK 

Target board has no JTAG clock.

GTI_STAT_ERR_CABLE_BREAK 

Debug probe cable is disconnected from the target board.

GTI_STAT_DEBUG_COMM_POWER_LOSS 

Target board has no power.

GTI_STAT_STUCK_IN_FAULT 

Target is stuck in a fault state.

GTI_STAT_CLOCK_DISAPPEARED 

A clock disappeared on the target.

GTI_STAT_FAULT_OCCURRED 

A fault occurred on the target.

GTI_STAT_NON_DEBUG_NO_CHANGE 

Misc.

status values. Non-debuggable device state unchanged since last status call.

GTI_STAT_NON_DEBUG_CHANGE 

Non-debuggable device state has changed.

GTI_STAT_SIM_FORWARD 

Rewind status values.

(Only valid for simulators.) Advance normally (unused, simulators only).

GTI_STAT_SIM_REWIND 

Rewind mode (unused, simulators only).

enum GTI_STATUS_TYPE

Status values that can be returned from GTI_STAT().

Enumerator:
GTI_STATUS_RUNNING 

Target device is running in debug mode.

GTI_STATUS_HALTED 

Target device is halted.

GTI_STATUS_NOPOWER 

Target board has no power.

GTI_STATUS_ILLOP 

Target device halted because of illegal operation.

GTI_STATUS_COMM 

Debug probe lost communications with target board.

GTI_STATUS_ERROR 

An error occurred retrieving status.

GTI_STATUS_HW_BKPT_HIT 

Target device halted because of hardware breakpoint.

GTI_STATUS_NO_CLOCK 

Target board has no JTAG clock.

GTI_STATUS_SW_BKPT_HIT 

Target device halted because of software breakpoint.

GTI_STATUS_FREE_RUNNING 

Target device is running free (not under debug control).

GTI_STATUS_CABLE_BREAK 

Debug probe cable is disconnected from the target board.

GTI_STATUS_DISCONNECTED_RUNNING 

Target device was disconnected while running.

GTI_STATUS_DISCONNECTED_HALTED 

Target device was disconnected while halted.

GTI_STATUS_NON_DEBUG_NORMAL 

Non-debuggable device state unchanged since last status call.

GTI_STATUS_NON_DEBUG_CHANGE 

Non-debuggable device state has changed.

GTI_STATUS_GLOBAL_BKPT_HIT 

Target device halted because of global breakpoint.

GTI_STATUS_HALT_CIO_SEMIHOSTING 

Target halted due to CIO/Semi-hosting SWBP.

Function Documentation

enum GTI_STATUS_TYPE() GTI_FN_STAT ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid )

Function type for GTI_STAT().

GTI_EXPORT GTI_LRETURN_TYPE GTI_GET_TARGET_PROPERTIES ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid,
GTI_INT_TYPE  ndx 
)

GTI_GET_TARGET_PROPERTIES() - Retrieve properties of the target device.

This function returns various properties of the target device. Which property to retrieve is determined by the property index in ndx.

Set ndx to GTI_TRG_BIG_ENDIAN to retrieve target endianness. 0 = little endian, 1 = big endian.
Set ndx to GTI_TRG_BOARD_REV to retrieve target board revision.
Set ndx to GTI_TRG_SILICON_REV to retrieve target device (silicon) revision.
Set ndx to GTI_TRG_DEVICE_DRIVER_REV to retrieve device driver revision.
Set ndx to GTI_TRG_CACHE_BYPASS to retrieve if device supports cache
bypass (C62x and C67x devices only).

Returns:
requested property value.
Parameters:
[in]hpidGTI API instance handle.
[in]ndxIndex of which property to return.
GTI_EXPORT enum GTI_STATUS_TYPE GTI_STAT ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid )

GTI_STAT() - Retrieve current status of the target device.

This function returns a GTI_STATUS_TYPE value representing the most relevent description of the target device's current status.

Returns:
current status value.
Parameters:
[in]hpidGTI API instance handle.
GTI_EXPORT GTI_RETURN_TYPE GTI_STAT_EX2 ( GTI_HANDLE_TYPE  hpid,
GTI_STAT_STRUCT *  stat 
)

GTI_STAT_EX2() - Retrieve extended status of the target device.

This function returns extended status of the target device in a GTI_STAT_STRUCT structure.

Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
Parameters:
[in]hpidGTI API instance handle.
[out]statExtended status of target.
